name: Woven Snakeskin Cushion
description: The Woven Snakeskin Cushion by KIFU PARIS is the ultimate luxury home textile piece. This textile is unique and original to the brand, who uses traditional weaving techniques with wooden looms to develop this supple and exotic textile. The back is in a cream sturdy cotton with white leather piping and the zipper is finished with a snakeskin and brass tassel. Available in a square or a rectangle shape and in 3 color choices: natural snakeskin, two tone grey snakeskin or dark grey snakeskin. Currently made to order 5-6 weeks.
